snippet: Illinois became the last state to allow public possession of concealed guns as lawmakers rushed Tuesday to complete a proposal ahead of a federal court’s deadline.
abstract: Illinois becomes last state to allow public possession of concealed guns as lawmakers rush to complete proposal ahead of federal court's deadline.
lead_paragraph: Illinois became the last state to allow public possession of concealed guns as lawmakers rushed Tuesday to complete a proposal ahead of a federal court’s deadline.

headline.main: Illinois: Veto of Gun Provisions Fails
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Veto of Gun Provisions Fails
